values:
Okay. so i guess i'm gonna start getting my workout schedule going again this week. 
College and I are doing okay... have midterms this tuesday. Might do some running this week. really work on the legs. like always. need to get back into chest and back.. i'm working on a good posture. I also need to work on some arms sometime this week. and of course abs..

so...

monday - legs. arms
tuesday - abs. chest
wednesday - legs. back
thursday - arms. chest

post if u have any ideas on what i exersizes i should do..

for overall fit goal.

Got a new bike recently. Trek, blue, mountainbike.. i loves it. XD anyway. I rode it today with the seat up to the right height and Man o man i got such a good workout in my legs. I was aching! So i felt like i definetly got something accomplished today besides boring old schoolwork. which happened to be geometry. but luckily there are only two days left until that class is over. i'm excited. Yeah. i might do some more leggie stuff. like squats on the side of the wall, leg lifts, and some cardio stretching. Tomorrow i think i'll work on chest and abs. but we'll see. i'm going to dive into fitness education pretty soon now that i'll have some more time. :D anyway. word up. and leave comments! -Daniel

Hey! my name is Daniel and this new blog will be for my workout updates. I'm still pretty new at working out so i thought i might put reviews of what i do each week. and maybe get feed back. I will add my professional before photos according to my Arnold S. Encyclopedia.. and I will add progress photos every 3 weeks to note developement. This place is free for people to comment and encourage or give advice. I would most definetly appreciate it! Sadley the past few weeks have been sacraficed to college work and it has been draining all my energy. However I've been stretching a lot lately especially in the mornings. Does anyone have any healthy stretching, waking up routines? Daniel's Fitness Goals *Look great! - Since I am just begining I want to achieve a sexy cardio look for starters. People posting cardio exersizes/advice would help me a lot. However, I do eventually want to be bodybuilder status so like they say I'm just going to build it up one at a time, start with looking sexy then moving on to mass. *Gain Mass - I intend on working every muscle classic muscle in my body. *No Muscle Favoritism, even though I am looking forward to a more muscular chest abs and legs. After I post pics I would appreciate people pointing out exactly which muscle i need to work on next and the name so I can expand my bodybuilding/anatomy vocab. I'm treating this journal as a learning tool, and I will expect it to change over time. Heros Wong Hong Lee Priest
